price: 故安拉将今世的报酬和后世优美的报酬赏赐他们，安拉是喜爱行善者的。
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
